doc:
Vince Edwards https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vince_Edwards 0 Vince Edwards (born Vincent Edward Zoine; July 9, 1928 – March 11, 1996) was an American actor, director, and singer. He was best known for his TV role as doctor Ben Casey and as Major Cliff Bricker in the 1968 war film The Devil's Brigade. Vince_Edwards ( born Vincent_Edward_Zoine ; July_9_,_1928 – March_11_,_1996 ) was an_American_actor , director , and singer . He was_best_known for his_TV_role as doctor_Ben_Casey and as Major_Cliff_Bricker in the_1968_war_film The_Devil 's_Brigade .
